video.title: TED Talks: Life Hack
video.synopsis: This TEDTalks collection reveals simple tricks that can transform your life. Learn how to start a movement, the secret to better work and much more.

episodes.synopsis: Social psychologist Amy Cuddy shows how power posing can affect testosterone and cortisol levels, and even have an impact on our chances for success.
episodes.title: Amy Cuddy: Your Body Language Shapes Who You Are

episodes.synopsis: When game designer Jane McGonigal found herself bedridden and suicidal following a severe concussion, she had a fascinating idea for how to heal.
episodes.title: Jane McGonigal: The Game That Can Give You 10 Extra Years of Life

episodes.synopsis: We believe that we should work to be happy, but do we have it backward? Psychologist Shawn Achor argues that happiness inspires productivity.
episodes.title: Shawn Achor: The Happy Secret to Better Work

episodes.synopsis: Science writer Joshua Foer describes the technique known as "the memory palace" to explain how people can quickly memorize long lists of numbers.
episodes.title: Joshua Foer: Feats of Memory Anyone Can Do

episodes.synopsis: With help from some surprising footage, Derek Sivers explains how movements really get started. (Hint: it takes two.)
episodes.title: Derek Sivers: How to Start a Movement

episodes.synopsis: Terry Moore found out he'd been tying his shoes the "wrong" way his whole life. In the spirit of TED, he takes the stage to share a better way.
episodes.title: Terry Moore: How to Tie Your Shoes

episodes.synopsis: With fascinating new research, Sheena Iyengar demonstrates how businesses (and others) can improve the customization process for consumers.
episodes.title: Sheena Iyengar: How to Make Choosing Easier

episodes.synopsis: Mindfulness expert Andy Puddicombe describes the transformative power of refreshing your mind by doing absolutely nothing for 10 minutes each day.
episodes.title: Andy Puddicombe: All It Takes Is 10 Mindful Minutes

episodes.synopsis: Arianna Huffington urges us to shut our eyes and see the big picture: Sleep can increase productivity and happiness and boost smarter decision making.
episodes.title: Arianna Huffington: How to Succeed? Get More Sleep

episodes.synopsis: David Pogue shares tips for computer, smartphone and camera users. You may know a few of these already, but there's probably at least one you don't.
episodes.title: David Pogue: 10 Top Time-Saving Tech Tips
